com.googlecode.streamflyer.core
Class ModifyingReader

java.lang.Object
  java.io.Reader
      com.googlecode.streamflyer.core.ModifyingReader
All Implemented Interfaces:
Closeable, Readable
public class ModifyingReader
extends Reader

A Reader that allows a Modifier to modify the characters in the underlying stream.

This class is not synchronized.

Marking is not supported by this reader.

Since:
06.05.2011
Author:
rwoo

Field Detail

delegate

protected Reader delegate
The reader that the reads from the underlying character stream.

modifier

private Modifier modifier
The modifier thats replaces, deletes, inserts characters of the underlying stream, and manages the buffer size.

characterBuffer

private StringBuilder characterBuffer
At its begin the buffer contains unmodifiable characters (might be needed for look-behind matches as known from regular expression matching). After the unmodifiable characters the buffer holds the modifiable characters. See firstModifiableCharacterInBuffer.

firstModifiableCharacterInBuffer

private int firstModifiableCharacterInBuffer
The position of the first character in the input buffer that is modifiable.

This character and the following characters in characterBuffer can be modified by the modifier.

minimumLengthOfLookBehind

private int minimumLengthOfLookBehind
The value is taken from AfterModification.getNewMinimumLengthOfLookBehind() after Modifier.modify(StringBuilder, int, boolean) is called. The value is requested by the Modifier.

If this value is greater than firstModifiableCharacterInBuffer, the modifier is probably faulty.

requestedNumCharactersInBuffer

private int requestedNumCharactersInBuffer
The value is the sum of AfterModification.getNewMinimumLengthOfLookBehind() and AfterModification.getNewNumberOfChars() after Modifier.modify(StringBuilder, int, boolean) is called. The value is requested by the Modifier.

numberOfCharactersToSkip

private int numberOfCharactersToSkip
The value is initially taken from AfterModification.getNumberOfCharactersToSkip() after Modifier.modify(StringBuilder, int, boolean) is called. Then during reading characters from the reader this value is decremented.

endOfStreamHit

private boolean endOfStreamHit
True if the end of stream was detected.

lastAfterModificationForDebuggingOnly

private AfterModification lastAfterModificationForDebuggingOnly
The holds the last AfterModification provided by the modifier. This property serves debugging purposes only.

Constructor Detail

ModifyingReader

public ModifyingReader(Reader reader,
                       Modifier modifier)
Parameters:
reader - The underlying reader that provides the original, not modified characters. For optimal performance choose a BufferedReader.
modifier - the object that modifies the stream.
Method Detail

updateBuffer

private void updateBuffer()
                   throws IOException
Updates the input buffer according to minimumLengthOfLookBehind and requestedNumCharactersInBuffer, and then fills the buffer up to its capacity.

Throws:
IOException

removeCharactersInBufferNotNeededAnyLonger

private void removeCharactersInBufferNotNeededAnyLonger()
Deletes those characters at the start of the buffer we do not need any longer.

adjustCapacityOfBuffer

protected void adjustCapacityOfBuffer()
Adjusts the capacity of the buffer.

fill

private void fill()
           throws IOException
Reads more characters into the input buffer. This method will block until the buffer is filled with requestedNumCharactersInBuffer characters , or an I/O error occurs, or the end of the stream is reached.

Throws:
IOException
